!Tablet of Vision: An old, familiar energy enters your body. Suddenly, a new, even more intense feeling appears!%% All the pleasure, pain, anger and love of the previous challengers of this power course through your veins!%% The screams you hear are your own.%% But are they real or imagined?%% You feel consciousness slipping away...%% ...%% ...%% And then you awake...%% Your lips move, but no words are formed.%% Could this be the end?
